Articles.Content: Hey guys! I'm MerrySnail, I've owned this game for about 3 days now and I absolutely love it! I've got some great support and help from the IRC channel so you might have seen me there. And I've made a few (2) forum posts so you might remember me from that. This is truly an awesome community with great people in!
Welcome to the community! Did you buy the game in the steam sales?
Thanks! No actually a friend bought it for me.
